name: Doppelrat
description: The Doppelrat is a Tiny monstrosity, known for its cunning and adaptability in combat. Its ability to create duplicates allows it to confuse enemies while it hides within a swarm of rats.
memorable: Distinctive for its ability to create rat duplicates and inflict a grotesque disease on its victims.
goals: Typically seeks to avoid direct confrontation, relying on deception and its abilities to create chaos.
relations: Often found in the company of other rats or similar vermin.
environment: Prefers shadowy areas and environments where it can blend in and evade detection.
strengths: Highly effective at stealth and evasion, with enhanced tactics due to Arcane Doubling and Hidden Original.
weaknesses: Extremely low physical strength makes it vulnerable in direct melee combat.
attacks: Uses a Bite attack that can poison and inflict a grotesque disease on its target.
most_powerful_ability: Arcane Doubling allows it to create swarms of duplicates that provide tactical advantages in combat.
senses: Has keen smell, granting it advantage on perception checks related to smell.
skills: Excels in stealth, making it particularly effective at avoiding detection.
additional_information: Inflicts the Horrific Doppeling disease through its bite.
Can control up to two swarms at a time.
Gains total cover while hidden in a swarm it created.
test_queries: Tiny monster that creates rat duplicates
adaptive monster that uses distraction in combat
